posts.post_content:
A Monster Necessity, this Jake Pfeister throwing card shown is a very presentable SGC 40 featuring the Sweet Cap Fact 42 overstrike reverse.
The card has centering, registration and corners of a higher graded example, but does have a couple of noticable modest stains on the reverse.  Who looks at the back anyway?:rolleyes:

Feast your eyes on the scan and then decide for yourself about this addition to your collection.  It was available today and is now SOLD.  If you don't say "I'll take it", your famine will continue.;)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10291/pfeister-throwing[/IMG]
